blog.name: amazingmitchell
blog.description: elle ★ az ★ writer ★ i take prompts!!! ★ may all your x reader fics burn

summary: spring week of prompts
title: spring week of prompts
body:
for the last week, @phanfictionevents has given out spring-themed prompts for us to write about. this was such an incredibly fun event and i wrote more in one week than i usually do in six months. here is a masterlist of the works i’ve written:

sunflowers

summary: dan has bad allergies and it’s the sunflowers in phil’s yard that are causing them.

once upon a dream

summary: dan’s family drags him to disneyland, where they meet prince charming, aka phil.

the dark side of spring

summary: dan and phil had an argument and dan calms down outside. it starts to rain and fluff ensues.

i would have loved to write more, but i had a ridiculous amount of schoolwork and group projects this week. i might decide to finish the prompts sometime soon, but until then, enjoy!

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: honestly my emotions towards dan roght now are the pure fuckin essence of "not angry just disappointed", like. he could just....
question: honestly my emotions towards dan roght now are the pure fuckin essence of "not angry just disappointed", like. he could just. give a sign of life? anything? but the void has claimed him as a victim i guess (he probs took phils creativity with him (next thing we know shane does this "helping the youtube dinosaurs to stay relevant" with them))
answer: As if Dan and Phil would let Shane Dawson within 100 feet of them.

reblog.comment: As if Dan and Phil would let Shane Dawson within 100 feet of them.

trail.content_raw: As if Dan and Phil would let Shane Dawson within 100 feet of them.
trail.content: As if Dan and Phil would let Shane Dawson within 100 feet of them.

blog.name: alittledizzy
blog.title: a.little.dizzy
blog.description:
there is a voice inside of you
that whispers all day long
i feel that this is right for me
i know that this is wrong
no teacher preacher parent friend
or wise man can decide
what's right for you - just listen to
the voice that speaks inside
- shel silverstein

Mandy. 30s.
Scifi fan, youtube fan, puppy fan.
RPF heavy blog.

Don't be a dick. :)

summary: Phandom Fic Fests Fic Finder Recs
title: Phandom Fic Fests Fic Finder Recs
body:
Despite finishing late, I had fun finding all of these! Some of these I had never read before, or I hadn’t read anything from the author. I think I can say I found some new favorites through this challenge. All of these were so lovely and I’m surprised I hadn’t read any of them before. 

1. Forever Home 

Be My Forever by @obsessive-fics​ (ao3)

Dan and Phil renovate a house and finally get their forever home (and a dog).

2. On The Run

Live Like Highway Robbers by @nagirici-remade

The morning that Dan Howell ran away was the very same morning that he met the boy.

3. Office Coworkers Au 

in the darkness, with you by @phanbliss (ao3) 

Phil, 28, video editor.
Phil doesn’t believe in love at first sight, and that is not about to change anytime soon. But what about lust? Just two short weeks ago, he’d say no, definitely not.

Not anymore. Not since he first locked eyes with Dan, the new intern at the company he works for. Not since he first thought, “I want him”.

Phil’s wish does come true, but there’s a catch.
It doesn’t mean anything.

4. Set in 2010 

I Wonder How Biology Can Explain… by @yikesola 

Dan’s drunk. He’s drunk and he misses Phil, who’d fallen asleep an hour ago. He’s drunk and wishes his boyfriend wasn’t currently 300km away.

5. Gaming Video

torchic by @huphilpuffs 

There’s a chick in Dan’s kitchen.

6. Fic w/ under 10 comments 

When the Day Met the Night by HowllingForPhan (ao3)

Dan is having a hard time lately and his new neighbor, Phil, isn’t helping.

7. Watching Anime

Second Chance by phan_anon (ao3)

Alpha!Phil is a slave bought for Omega!Dan’s use. But there’s more to the Omega’s story than Phil originally believed, and he may need the Alpha’s help in a way he never expected.

8. Shopping

quiescent kind of love by @cutie-with-booty​ (ao3)

Halloween always brings out mischief and wonder but a strange costume request from Phil’s son leaves him questioning his parenting.

9. Clothes Sharing

Life is Better With You by @crescendohowell

Dan and Phil aren’t dating but they do some things that could be perceived as couply.

10. Hurt/Comfort 

Stupid with Love by phanitup (ao3) 

Phil fell in love with Dan and never fell out of it. Dan was never in love in the first place.

summary: the water might be lovely chapter 19 word count: 6K (99K so far) rated: E  summary: Dan, utterly fed up with uni, runs away to...
body:
the water might be lovely

chapter 19

word count: 6K (99K so far)

rated: E

summary:

Dan, utterly fed up with uni, runs away to the Isle of Man.

Seeking escape, he gets more than he bargained for when he rents a room out from happy-go-lucky, recent grad, Phil Lester.

excerpt:

“So… You two have a fun night?”

“Not particularly,” Dan scowls. “Why?”

“No reason,” Gemma comments, pressing her lips together in a knowing look.

[read on ao3]

[read from beginning]
